source.query:
WITH bounds AS (
  SELECT 
    date_trunc('month', MIN(transaction_date)) AS min_month,
    date_trunc('month', MAX(transaction_date)) AS max_month
  FROM ch_fss."transaction"
),
months AS (
  SELECT 
    generate_series(min_month, max_month, interval '1 month') AS month_start
  FROM bounds
)
SELECT 
  to_char(month_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_start,
  to_char(month_start + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '0.001 second', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_end
FROM months
ORDER BY month_start;

text.value:
insert into fss.pipelinerunstatus
(pl_name, pl_runid, pl_triggertime, pl_triggertype, End_time, Start_time,status,error_message)
values (
  '@{pipeline().Pipeline}',
  '@{pipeline().RunId}',
  '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}',
  '@{pipeline().TriggerType}',
  '@{variables('End_time')}',
  '@{variables('Start_time')}',
  '@{activity('Copy data').status}',
  '@{if(equals(activity('Copy data').status, 'Failed'), activity('Copy data').error_message, null)}'
)
